body_html:
I got one machine working!
Was trying many different combinations, but finally using ubuntu 16.04, 361 driver from ubuntu repo, runfile installer to install just cuda toolkit, and nvidia cuda and cuda-devel image, and mucking with our Dockerfile, I got everything working.

I got rid of the old VM before this report, but I will create the issue once I can re-reproduce the failure.
Thanks for your input, and very quick response Felix!

body:
I got one machine working!
Was trying many different combinations, but finally using ubuntu 16.04, 361 driver from ubuntu repo, runfile installer to install just cuda toolkit, and nvidia cuda and cuda-devel image, and mucking with our Dockerfile, I got everything working.

I got rid of the old VM before this report, but I will create the issue once I can re-reproduce the failure.
Thanks for your input, and very quick response Felix!
